column4: Nvidia shares turn positive after Citron buys stock
column5: Shares of Nvidia Corp reversed course after markets opened to gain about 2.5 percent on Tuesday after shortseller Citron Research said it has bought the chip designer's stock.

column4: Nvidia shares turn positive after Citron buys stock
